verses.verse: <S%G5023>These<s%> words <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up his <S%G3788>eyes<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> your <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that your <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G1392>glorify<s%> you:

As you have <S%G1325>given<s%> him <S%G1849>power<s%> over <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> that he should <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> to as many as you have <S%G1325>given<s%> him.

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>eternal,<s%> that they might <S%G1097>know<s%> you the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have sent. <S%G649><s%>
I have <S%G1392>glorified<s%> you <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> I have <S%G5048>finished<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me to do. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G3568>now,<s%> O <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> you me with <S%G4572>your<s%> <S%G4572>own<s%> <S%G4572>self<s%> with the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2192>had<s%> with you <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> was.

I have <S%G5319>manifested<s%> your <S%G3686>name<s%> to the <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me out of the <S%G2889>world:<s%> <S%G4671>your<s%> they were, and you <S%G1325>gave<s%> them me; and they have <S%G5083>kept<s%> your word. <S%G3056><s%>
<S%G3568>Now<s%> they have <S%G1097>known<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3745>whatever<s%> you have <S%G1325>given<s%> me are of you.

For I have <S%G1325>given<s%> to them the <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me; and they have received <S%G2983><s%> them, and have <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G230>surely<s%> that I <S%G1831>came<s%> out from you, and they have <S%G4100>believed<s%> that you did <S%G649>send<s%> me.
I <S%G2065>pray<s%> for them: I <S%G2065>pray<s%> not for the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but for them <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1325>given<s%> me; for they are yours. <S%G4671><s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1699>mine<s%> are <S%G4674>yours,<s%> and yours <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4674><s%> are <S%G1699>mine;<s%> and I am <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in them.

And <S%G3765>now<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but <S%G3778>these<s%> are in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> and I <S%G2064>come<s%> to you. <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> own <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have <S%G1325>given<s%> me, that they may be <S%G1520>one,<s%> as we are.

<S%G3753>While<s%> I was with them in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> I <S%G5083>kept<s%> them in your <S%G3686>name:<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> that you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me I have <S%G5442>kept,<s%> and <S%G3762>none<s%> of them is <S%G622>lost,<s%> but the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G684>perdition;<s%> that the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> might be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

And <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> I to you; and <S%G5023>these<s%> things I <S%G2980>speak<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that they might <S%G2192>have<s%> my <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in themselves. <S%G848><s%>

I have <S%G1325>given<s%> them your <S%G3056>word;<s%> and the <S%G2889>world<s%> has <S%G3404>hated<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they are not of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> not of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
I <S%G2065>pray<s%> not that you should <S%G142>take<s%> them out of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but that you should <S%G5083>keep<s%> them from the evil. <S%G4190><s%>
They are not of the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> not of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
<S%G37>Sanctify<s%> them <S%G1722>through<s%> your <S%G225>truth:<s%> your <S%G3056>word<s%> is truth. <S%G225><s%>
As you have <S%G649>sent<s%> me <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2504>even<s%> so have I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>
And for their sakes I <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> that they <S%G2532>also<s%> might be <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G3366>Neither<s%> <S%G2065>pray<s%> I for <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3440>alone,<s%> but for them <S%G2532>also<s%> which shall <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> me <S%G1223>through<s%> their word; <S%G3056><s%>

That they <S%G3956>all<s%> may be <S%G1520>one;<s%> as you, Father, <S%G3962><s%> are in me, and I in you, that they <S%G2532>also<s%> may be <S%G1520>one<s%> in us: that the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G4100>believe<s%> that you have <S%G649>sent<s%> me.
And the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G1325>gave<s%> me I have <S%G1325>given<s%> them; that they may be <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as we are one: <S%G1520><s%>

I in them, and you in me, that they may be <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> in <S%G1520>one;<s%> and that the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1097>know<s%> that you have <S%G649>sent<s%> me, and have <S%G25>loved<s%> them, as you have <S%G25>loved<s%> me.

<S%G3962>Father,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> that they <S%G2548>also,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you have <S%G1325>given<s%> me, be with me <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am;<s%> that they may <S%G2334>behold<s%> my <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G1325>given<s%> me: for you <S%G25>loved<s%> me <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2602>foundation<s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

O <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> has not <S%G1097>known<s%> you: but I have <S%G1097>known<s%> you, and <S%G3778>these<s%> have <S%G1097>known<s%> that you have <S%G649>sent<s%> me.

And I have <S%G1107>declared<s%> to them your <S%G3686>name,<s%> and will declare <S%G1107><s%> it: that the <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G25>loved<s%> me may be in them, and I in them.
